	<table width="100%" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="10" bgcolor="#CCFF99">
	<tr>

    		</td>

		<td width="75%" valign="center" bgcolor="#FFFFFF" bordercolor="#FFFFFF"> 
      			<H2 style="{font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,Geneva,sans-serif;color:#0099cc;}" >
Locus Specific Mutation Databases</H2>
    		</td>

		<table width="100%" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="10">
		  <tr> 
			<td width="100%" valign="BOTTOM" bgcolor="#0099cc">			  
				<center>				
				<i><font class="medium" color="#FFFFFF"><B>Last Update 12 Feb. 2011</B></font></i>
			  </center>
			</td>
		  </tr>
		</table>
		<BR>
		<TABLE CELLPADDING=5 CELLSPACING=5 WIDTH="100%" ALIGN=center STYLE="border:1px solid #DDDDDD;">
			<CAPTION><FONT COLOR=#FF0000><B>IMPORTANT NOTE:</B></FONT><CAPTION>
			<TR>
				<TD VALIGN=top><IMG SRC="http://www.genenames.org/images/hgnclogo.png" BORDER=0></TD>
				<TD VALIGN=top>
				  <h4 align="left"><b><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-s erif" color="#FF9900">
				  	 Genes are in order of <a href="http://www.genenames.org/guidelines.html">HUGO 
					APPROVED GENE DESIGNATION</a> not alias. e.g. &quot;p53&quot; will be found 
					under &quot;TP53&quot; while &quot;CD40L&quot; or &quot;TNFSF5&quot; will be found under &quot;CD40LG&quot; 
					and so on. 
				 	<P>If you wish to find an Approved gene symbol please select <A HREF="http://www.genenames.org/cgi-bin/hgnc_search.pl">HGNC Search</A>.
					</font></b></h4>
				  <p align="left"><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>If 
					your gene is not in these lists, you may like to check the &quot;<a href="http://www.hgvs.org/dblist/disease.html">Disease 
					Centred</a>&quot;, &quot;<a href="http://www.hgvs.org/dblist/mito.html">Mitochondrial Mutations</a>&quot; 
					or <a href="http://www.hgvs.org/dblist/other.html">&quot;Other mutation Databases&quot; </a> 
					database links</b></font> <font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>as 
					it may be in one of those.</b></font></p>
				  <p align="left"><font size="2"><b><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">If 
					you wish to add an LSDB please go to the <a href="http://www.centralmutations.org/LsdbAdd.php" target="_blank"> LSDB Submission Page </a> <!-- ,or you can contact <a href="mailto:rania@gdrc.hfi.unimelb.edu.au">Rania</a> --> &nbsp Please note that some LSDBs have a <em>Curator vacancy</em> - if you would like to serve please contact the acting curator via that database.</font></b></font></p>
				</TD>
			</TR>
		</TABLE>
	
		<TABLE ALIGN="center" CELLPADDING="2" CELLSPACING="5">

		<SCRIPT TYPE="TEXT/JAVASCRIPT">
		function f(o){
		  o.value=o.value.toUpperCase().replace(/([^!-Z])/g,"");
		}
		function s(e)
		{
			var keynum;
			var keychar;

			if(window.event) // IE
			{
			keynum = e.keyCode;
			}
			else if(e.which) // Netscape/Firefox/Opera
			{
			keynum = e.which;
			}
			if (keynum==13) 
				window.location='#'+ document.all.url.value;
		}

		</SCRIPT>

				<input type='button' value='Go to Gene!' OnClick="window.location='#'+ document.all.url.value;">
			</TD>

				<FONT CLASS="">Johan T. den Dunnen Leiden Univ. Med Centre <em> (acting), Curator vacancy</em></FONT>
				&nbsp;
			</TD>
		</TR>
